channel.title: cloud-native on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in cloud-native on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Technologies Facebook is using
item.description: From Facebook https://opensource.facebook.com/ Hydra Links https://github.com/facebookresearch/hydra https://hydra.cc/ Powered by Omegaconf. 1 2 3 4 5 6 Hydra [framework] Elegantly configure complex applications. https://hydra.cc Basic example Configuration file config.yaml 1 2 3 4 db: driver: mysql user: omry pass: secret Python file my_app.py 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 import hydra from omegaconf import DictConfig @hydra.
